Strings.Text:
{scroll 2}It seems to be an electric
power supply switcher.{clear 0}It is set next to the
cultivation tank.{clear 0}Will you switch the electric
power supply?{branch 0}
{scroll 2}A synthesizer of \nchemicals.{clear 0}{color 1}Medium Base{color 0} can \nbe set here.
{scroll 2}It seems that the power\nis shut off.
{scroll 2}It seems that they were\ncreating chemicals{clear 0}\nof some type here.
{scroll 2}It seems that they were\ncultivating a part of{clear 0}\na creature's cells here.
